00041 static void check_internal_diagonal_for_triangle(Domaine& domain)
00042 {
00043 // nothing to do
00044 }
00045 
00046 static void check_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron(Domaine& domain)
00047 {
00048   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00049   IntTab&           cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00050 
00051   ArrOfDouble lengths(3);
00052 
00053   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00054   int err_count = 0;
00055   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00056     {
00057       const int s0 = cells(cell,0);
00058       const int s1 = cells(cell,1);
00059       const int s2 = cells(cell,2);
00060       const int s3 = cells(cell,3);
00061 
00062       const double x0 = nodes(s0,0);
00063       const double x1 = nodes(s1,0);
00064       const double x2 = nodes(s2,0);
00065       const double x3 = nodes(s3,0);
00066 
00067       const double y0 = nodes(s0,1);
00068       const double y1 = nodes(s1,1);
00069       const double y2 = nodes(s2,1);
00070       const double y3 = nodes(s3,1);
00071 
00072       const double z0 = nodes(s0,2);
00073       const double z1 = nodes(s1,2);
00074       const double z2 = nodes(s2,2);
00075       const double z3 = nodes(s3,2);
00076 
00077       const double x01 = 0.5 * (x0+x1);
00078       const double x02 = 0.5 * (x0+x2);
00079       const double x03 = 0.5 * (x0+x3);
00080       const double x12 = 0.5 * (x1+x2);
00081       const double x13 = 0.5 * (x1+x3);
00082       const double x23 = 0.5 * (x2+x3);
00083 
00084       const double y01 = 0.5 * (y0+y1);
00085       const double y02 = 0.5 * (y0+y2);
00086       const double y03 = 0.5 * (y0+y3);
00087       const double y12 = 0.5 * (y1+y2);
00088       const double y13 = 0.5 * (y1+y3);
00089       const double y23 = 0.5 * (y2+y3);
00090 
00091       const double z01 = 0.5 * (z0+z1);
00092       const double z02 = 0.5 * (z0+z2);
00093       const double z03 = 0.5 * (z0+z3);
00094       const double z12 = 0.5 * (z1+z2);
00095       const double z13 = 0.5 * (z1+z3);
00096       const double z23 = 0.5 * (z2+z3);
00097 
00098       lengths[0] = (x23-x01)*(x23-x01) + (y23-y01)*(y23-y01) + (z23-z01)*(z23-z01);
00099       lengths[1] = (x13-x02)*(x13-x02) + (y13-y02)*(y13-y02) + (z13-z02)*(z13-z02);
00100       lengths[2] = (x12-x03)*(x12-x03) + (y12-y03)*(y12-y03) + (z12-z03)*(z12-z03);
00101 
00102       const int id = imin_array(lengths);
00103 
00104       if (id == 0)
00105         {
00106           if (lengths[0] <  lengths[1])
00107             {
00108               if (err_count == 0)
00109                 {
00110                   Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron()'" << finl;
00111                   Cerr << " The following cells have a bad internal diagonal :" << finl;
00112                 }
00113               Cerr << cell << finl;
00114               ++err_count;
00115             }
00116         }
00117       else if (id == 1)
00118         {
00119 // rien a faire
00120         }
00121       else if (id == 2)
00122         {
00123           if (lengths[2] < lengths[1])
00124             {
00125               if (err_count == 0)
00126                 {
00127                   Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron()'" << finl;
00128                   Cerr << " The following cells have a bad internal diagonal :" << finl;
00129                 }
00130               Cerr << cell << finl;
00131               ++err_count;
00132             }
00133         }
00134       else
00135         {
00136           if (err_count == 0)
00137             {
00138               Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron()'" << finl;
00139               Cerr << " The following cells have a bad internal diagonal :" << finl;
00140             }
00141           Cerr << cell << finl;
00142           ++err_count;
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00146   if (err_count>0)
00147     {
00148       Process::exit();
00149     }
00150 }
00151 
00152 static void check_internal_diagonal(Domaine& domain)
00153 {
00154   const Nom& cell_type = domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je();
00155 
00156   Motcles understood_keywords(2);
00157   understood_keywords[0] = "Triangle";
00158   understood_keywords[1] = "Tetraedre";
00159 
00160   int rank = understood_keywords.search(cell_type);
00161   switch(rank)
00162     {
00163     case 0  :
00164       check_internal_diagonal_for_triangle(domain);
00165       break;
00166     case 1  :
00167       check_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron(domain);
00168       break;
00169     default :
00170       Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_internal_diagonal()'" << finl;
00171       Cerr << "  Unknown cell type : " << cell_type << finl;
00172       Cerr << "  Verifier_Simplexes can only check Triangles and Tetrahedrons" << finl;
00173       Process::exit();
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 static void check_positive_volumes_for_triangle(Domaine& domain)
00178 {
00179   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00180   IntTab&           cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00181 
00182   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00183   int err_count = 0;
00184   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00185     {
00186       const int s0 = cells(cell,0);
00187       const int s1 = cells(cell,1);
00188       const int s2 = cells(cell,2);
00189 
00190       const double x0 = nodes(s0,0);
00191       const double x1 = nodes(s1,0);
00192       const double x2 = nodes(s2,0);
00193 
00194       const double y0 = nodes(s0,1);
00195       const double y1 = nodes(s1,1);
00196       const double y2 = nodes(s2,1);
00197 
00198       const double area = 0.5 * ((x1-x0)*(y2-y0) - (x2-x0)*(y1-y0));
00199       if ( area < 0.)
00200         {
00201           if (err_count == 0)
00202             {
00203               Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_positive_volumes_for_triangle()'" << finl;
00204               Cerr << " The following cells have a negative orientation :" << finl;
00205             }
00206           Cerr << cell << finl;
00207           ++err_count;
00208         }
00209     }
00210   if (err_count>0)
00211     {
00212       Process::exit();
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 static void check_positive_volumes_for_tetrahedron(Domaine& domain)
00217 {
00218   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00219   IntTab&           cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00220 
00221   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00222   int err_count = 0;
00223   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00224     {
00225       const int s0 = cells(cell,0);
00226       const int s1 = cells(cell,1);
00227       const int s2 = cells(cell,2);
00228       const int s3 = cells(cell,3);
00229 
00230       const double x0 = nodes(s0,0);
00231       const double x1 = nodes(s1,0);
00232       const double x2 = nodes(s2,0);
00233       const double x3 = nodes(s3,0);
00234 
00235       const double y0 = nodes(s0,1);
00236       const double y1 = nodes(s1,1);
00237       const double y2 = nodes(s2,1);
00238       const double y3 = nodes(s3,1);
00239 
00240       const double z0 = nodes(s0,2);
00241       const double z1 = nodes(s1,2);
00242       const double z2 = nodes(s2,2);
00243       const double z3 = nodes(s3,2);
00244 
00245       const double volume = (1./6.) * ( (x1-x0) * (y2-y0) * (z3-z0) +
00246                                         (x2-x0) * (y3-y0) * (z1-z0) +
00247                                         (x3-x0) * (y1-y0) * (z2-z0) -
00248                                         (z1-z0) * (y2-y0) * (x3-x0) -
00249                                         (x2-x0) * (z3-z0) * (y1-y0) -
00250                                         (y3-y0) * (x1-x0) * (z2-z0)   );
00251 
00252       if (volume < 0.)
00253         {
00254           if (err_count == 0)
00255             {
00256               Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_positive_volumes_for_tetrahedron()'" << finl;
00257               Cerr << " The following cells have a negative orientation :" << finl;
00258             }
00259           Cerr << cell << finl;
00260           ++err_count;
00261         }
00262     }
00263   if (err_count>0)
00264     {
00265       Process::exit();
00266     }
00267 }
00268 
00269 
00270 static void check_positive_volumes(Domaine& domain)
00271 {
00272   const Nom& cell_type = domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je();
00273 
00274   Motcles understood_keywords(2);
00275   understood_keywords[0] = "Triangle";
00276   understood_keywords[1] = "Tetraedre";
00277 
00278   int rank = understood_keywords.search(cell_type);
00279   switch(rank)
00280     {
00281     case 0  :
00282       check_positive_volumes_for_triangle(domain);
00283       break;
00284     case 1  :
00285       check_positive_volumes_for_tetrahedron(domain);
00286       break;
00287     default :
00288       Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Simplexes.cpp 'check_positive_volumes()'" << finl;
00289       Cerr << "  Unknown cell type : " << cell_type << finl;
00290       Cerr << "  Verifier_Simplexes can only check Triangles and Tetrahedrons" << finl;
00291       Process::exit();
00292     }
00293 }
00294 
00295 void Verifier_Simplexes::check_domain(Domaine& domain)
00296 {
00297   check_internal_diagonal(domain);
00298   check_positive_volumes(domain);
00299 }
00300 
00301 Entree& Verifier_Simplexes::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00302 {
00303   associer_domaine(is);
00304 
00305   Domaine& domain = domaine();
00306   check_domain(domain);
00307 
00308   return is;
00309 }
